infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov

Class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
      • infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator

    public class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov
extends ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov) to make the calculations.

    That is, this class implements an AIS calculator using the KSG nearest-neighbour approach. This is achieved by plugging in MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov as the calculator into the parent class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.

    Usage is as per the paradigm outlined for ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, with:

    • The constructor step is either a simple call to ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov(), or else specifies which KSG algorithm to implement via ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov(int) or ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov(String);
    • ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String) allowing properties for MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov.setProperty(String, String) (except MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate.PROP_TIME_DIFF as outlined in ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String)).
    • Computed values are in nats, not bits!

    References:

    • J.T. Lizier, M. Prokopenko and A.Y. Zomaya, "Local measures of information storage in complex distributed computation", Information Sciences, vol. 208, pp. 39-54, 2012.
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)
    See Also:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo, MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov
